Parameters: int: The delta to add to the current volume.
onUpdateVolume(int).Description: Requests an incremental volume update for the route.

onRelease().Description: Releases the route controller, allowing it to free its resources.

Parameters: int: The reason for unselecting the route.
onUnselect(int).Description: Unselects the route and provides a reason. The default implementation calls @B_android#support#v7#media#MediaRouteProvider#RouteController#onUnselect_E@. The reason provided will be one of the following: @B_android#support#v7#media#MediaRouter#UNSELECT_REASON_UNKNOWN_E@ @B_android#support#v7#media#MediaRouter#UNSELECT_REASON_DISCONNECTED_E@ @B_android#support#v7#media#MediaRouter#UNSELECT_REASON_STOPPED_E@ @B_android#support#v7#media#MediaRouter#UNSELECT_REASON_ROUTE_CHANGED_E@

Parameters: int: The new volume value between 0 and @B_android#support#v7#media#MediaRouteDescriptor#getVolumeMax_E@.
onSetVolume(int).Description: Requests to set the volume of the route.

ClassDesc: Provides control over a particular route. The media router obtains a route controller for a route whenever it needs to control a route. When a route is selected, the media router invokes the @B_android#support#v7#media#MediaRouteProvider#RouteController#onSelect_E@ method of its route controller. While selected, the media router may call other methods of the route controller to request that it perform certain actions to the route. When a route is unselected, the media router invokes the @B_android#support#v7#media#MediaRouteProvider#RouteController#onUnselect_E@ method of its route controller. When the media route no longer needs the route controller it will invoke the @B_android#support#v7#media#MediaRouteProvider#RouteController#onRelease_E@ method to allow the route controller to free its resources. There may be multiple route controllers simultaneously active for the same route. Each route controller will be released separately. All operations on the route controller are asynchronous and results are communicated via callbacks.
